PHRASE.LANG: The Ultimate Men in Black™ Collection
Die Ultimative Men in Black™ Collection
La gran colección Men in Black™
The Ultimate Men in Black™ Collection

This Ultimate Men in Black™ collection comes with the following list of items to help you protect the Earth from the scum of the universe:
 1. Men in Black™ Headquarters (Private Space)
 2. Men in Black™ Headquarters - Clubhouse
 3. MIB™ - Frank the Pug (companion)
 4. MIB™ - Worm Guy (Companion)
 5. MIB™ - Male Costumes: Agent, Worm guy, Nakkadan, Nakkadan Elite, Alien Brain, Adorian Elite, Adorian Medium an Adorian small.
 6. MIB™ - Female Costumes: Agent, Worm guy, Adorian small.
 7. MIB™ - HQ Chair
 8. MIB™ - Boris Bike
 9. MIB™ - Monocycle
 10. MIB™ - Neurolizer (Male/Female hands)
 11. MIB™ - Agent Pistol (Male/Female hands and ornament)
 12. MIB™ - Deatomizer (Male/Female hands and ornament)
 13. MIB™ - Noisy Cricket (Male/Female hands and ornament)

 15. MIB™ - Demoleculizer (Male/Female hands and ornament)
 16. MIB™ - Adorian Crossbow (Male/Female hands and ornament)
 17. MIB™ - Nakkadan Taser Gun (Male/Female hands and ornament)
 18. MIB™ - Nakkadan Disintegrator Ray (Male/Female hands and ornament)
 19. MIB™ - Adorian Sonar Gun (Male/Female hands and ornament)
 20. MIB™ - Adorian Plasma Rifle (Male/Female hands and ornament)
 21. MIB™ - Adorian Energy Blaster (Male/Female hands and ornament)
 22. MIB™ - The Great Attractor’s Glover (Male/Female hands)
 23. MIB™ - Flying Car Bundle
 24. MIB™ - Car Bundle
 25. MIB™ - Nakkadan Elite (Ornament)
 26. MIB™ - Nakkadan (Ornament)
 27. MIB™ - Jetpack (Full-size)
